game.name: 行列のできる武器鍛冶屋
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A blacksmith shop with a "line" of unique adventurers! Use your memory and timing mini-games to quickly identify each customer's preferred weapon and forge it. In the Battle Phase, your armed customers fight. Power up your regulars (MVPs) and defeat the bosses. Become the busiest blacksmith!
